Release trapped air.sentence: The healthcare provider assesses the patient's condition to determine the presence of trapped air.
Release trapped air.subject: The healthcare provider

Release trapped air.sentence: The healthcare provider positions the patient appropriately to facilitate the release of trapped air.
Release trapped air.subject: The healthcare provider

Release trapped air.sentence: The healthcare provider uses a needle or catheter to access the area where the trapped air is located.
Release trapped air.subject: The healthcare provider

Release trapped air.sentence: The healthcare provider carefully withdraws the trapped air to relieve the patient's discomfort.
Release trapped air.subject: The healthcare provider

Release trapped air.sentence: The healthcare provider monitors the patient for any complications after the procedure has been completed.
Release trapped air.subject: The healthcare provider
